caption.p: Ordinal seven-point scale used as primary outcome in the U.S. National Institutes of Health sponsored clinical trial ( NCT04280705) on remdesivir ⁎.

th.italic: Outcome: proportion of participants in each of the below ratings (Day 15)

tr.td: Hospitalized, on invasive mechanical ventilation or extracorporeal membrane oxygenation
Hospitalized, on non-invasive ventilation or high flow oxygen devices
Not hospitalized, no limitations on activities

fn.p: Please note that information is taken verbatim from the U.S. National Library of Medicine clinical trials registry [ 42].
